name: I'm the only one
description:
but you are the only one who have immunity from this infection 

one day you got a radio message that there is a place with no  infection and there is a boat you could use to reach this place.

How to play 

-> you have a tutorial inside the game

Programming : C#

Game Engine : Unity

Art Software : Photoshop

Music and Sound Effect : music have no copy right and no credit from youtube
